In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **spellbook of wizard lock** allow you to cast the **spell of wizard lock**. It is a level 2 [matter spell](/wiki/Matter_spell "Matter spell").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
- [4 See also](#See_also)

## Effects

When cast, the effect is the same as that of a [wand of locking](/wiki/Wand_of_locking "Wand of locking"), closing and locking any open doors and lockable containers in the direction it was cast; if cast at an empty doorway, it will create a locked door. Further information can be found on [Wizard lock](/wiki/Wizard_lock "Wizard lock").

## Strategy

Like the wand, the spell of wizard lock is useful for closing doors at a range, which is handy when escaping from certain monsters or else securing a room for other reasons, such as [nurse dancing](/wiki/Nurse_dancing "Nurse dancing") or sacrificing at an [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") found outside of a temple. It can also be used with the [knock](/wiki/Spellbook_of_knock "Spellbook of knock") to weaponize the [castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle") [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge"); however, the wand may be preferable for all these purposes due to the power cost, unless there is a means of power regeneration/recovery on hand. Both this and the knock spell can also be used to train up skill in [matter spells](/wiki/Matter_spells "Matter spells") in order to cast high-level spells such as [polymorph](/wiki/Spellbook_of_polymorph "Spellbook of polymorph") and [dig](/wiki/Spellbook_of_dig "Spellbook of dig").

## SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), the spell of wizard lock has a different effect on the new indestructible doors introduced at the top level of [Vlad's Tower](/wiki/Vlad%27s_Tower "Vlad's Tower") - it only closes the doors without locking them. ("The door swings shut!")

## See also

- [Spellbook of knock](/wiki/Spellbook_of_knock "Spellbook of knock")
